MNISTCopyTask module¶

Repeat a sequence of MNIST images.

The goal is to replicate a sequence of MNIST images. The input is a sequence of MNIST images, followed by black images of the same sequence length. The ideal output is a vector of zeros for each actual image. When the black images begin, the DNC should emit a one-hot vector repeating the class of the real images.

class MNISTCopyTask.ConvModel(input_size, output_size, read_vec_size, batch_size)¶

Bases: object

A simple convolutional neural network to be used as a controller.
